name: grandmas ocean WIP
description:
Grandma’s Ocean (work in progress) is some kind of 2D point and click game/interactive graphic novel, as well as an attempt to seek connections and re-imagine personal narrative through the medium of game-making, collage and story-telling.

The theme of the project revolves around body, memories, home and generational connections. 

*Please note: the game needs more  work in animation, coded game action, sound, camera movement as well as more frames to complete narrative and thematic content. Overall, the game needs to be worked on more to rely less on text.
